div.bibl: The Chicago Chronicle, Wk. of July 23, 1926. Vol. 8, p.1.

body.p: Miss Lillian Herstein, who is a candidate for the Legislature from the Nineteenth Senatorial District, has a large list of occupations attached to her name.

She is vice-president of the Liberal Club of Chicago, chairman of the Schools Committee of the Chicago Federation of Labor, a member of the faculty of the Bryn Mawr Summer School for Women Workers, and at present, a teacher at Crane Junior College.
